summary: Provides utilities to construct Qiskit circuits that implement Clifford operators represented in symplectic form, offering helper routines that translate elementary Clifford gates (e.g., H, S, X, Y, Z, CX, etc.) into circuit instructions.
business_intent: Facilitates the creation and simulation of Clifford circuits within Qiskit, allowing users to convert abstract Clifford representations into executable quantum programs for testing, verification, and algorithmic research.
